tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE influencer_marketing_campaigns (
    campaign_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    influencer_id INT,
    campaign_name VARCHAR(255),
    test_group VARCHAR(10),
    campaign_start_date DATE,
    campaign_end_date DATE,
    campaign_budget DECIMAL(10, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE influencer_campaigns (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    influencer_name VARCHAR(255),
    campaign_name VARCHAR(255),
    campaign_start_date DATE,
    campaign_end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE ab_test_results (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    test_id INT,
    campaign_id INT,
    test_name VARCHAR(255),
    test_variation VARCHAR(255),
    clicks INT,
    conversions INT
);

CREATE TABLE Campaigns (
    campaign_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    campaign_name TEXT,
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE,
    budget DECIMAL(10, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE ExperimentResults (
    result_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    experiment_id INT,
    group_name TEXT,
    metric_name TEXT,
    metric_value FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE test_results (
    results_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    test_id INT,
    campaign_id INT,
    variation_name VARCHAR(50),
    result_metric VARCHAR(50),
    result_value FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE engagement_metrics (
  metrics_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  campaign_id INT,
  influencer_id INT,
  engagement_rate FLOAT,
  reach INT,
  conversions INT
);

CREATE TABLE a_b_testing (
  test_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  test_name VARCHAR(50),
  test_description TEXT,
  start_date DATE,
  end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE test_results (
  result_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  test_id INT,
  campaign_id INT,
  influencer_id INT,
  test_variants VARCHAR(50),
  conversion_rate FLOAT
);
